title: City & Community - What Does Racial Capitalism Have to Do With Cities and Communities?
itunes:title: City & Community - What Does Racial Capitalism Have to Do With Cities and Communities?
description: Authors Prentiss Dantzler and Junia Howell discuss their article, "What Does Racial Capitalism Have to Do With Cities and Communities?" published in the September 2022 issue of City & Community.
